DOC.brief_summary: This study will measure the effectiveness and any side effects of LY317615 in patients with Diffuse large B-cell lymphoma (a sub-type of Non-Hodgkins Lymphoma).
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Oral LY317615 in Relapsed or Refractory Diffuse Large B-Cell Lymphomas.
DOC.criteria: A diagnosis of recurrent or refractory Diffuse Bcell NonHodgkin's lymphoma. Adequate organ functions. Able to swallow capsules. More than 3 prior treatments for this disease. Serious heart problems.
